alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 9:29AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER POTENTIAL TODAY... High temperatures in the upper 50s to near 60 degrees combined with a very dry air mass will support minimum afternoon relative humidities of 20 to 25 percent in portions of southern Connecticut. Southwest winds will gust to 20 to 25 mph at times. Incorporating input from the Connecticut Department of Energy and Environmental Protection`s Division of Forestry, elevated fire weather potential is expected today. Use caution when handling ignition sources, including but not limited to matches and cigarettes.
